using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.NewTypes.Input
{
	public class SubNestedClassAsync
	{
		public Task ReadAsync()
		{
			try
			{
				var nested = NestedFactory.Create();
				nested.DoSomething();
				return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
			}
			catch (Exception ex)
			{
				return Task.FromException<object>(ex);
			}
		}

		public class NestedFactory
		{
			public static Nested Create()
			{
				return new Nested();
			}
		}

		public class Nested
		{
			public void DoSomething()
			{
				var sub = new SubNested();
				sub.Do();
			}

			private class SubNested
			{
				public void Do()
				{
					
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
